content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step assembly instructions.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 3 layers
- Uses red, yellow, and orange blocks
- Contains arches on the bottom and middle layers
- Has a triangular roof-like structure on top

Block Composition:
- Bottom layer: Two red arch blocks
- Middle layer: Three yellow rectangular blocks and one red arch block
- Top layer: One red block with orange triangular roof piece

Assembly Instructions:
{
Step1: Move block with index 1 (red arch block, left bottom)
Step2: Move block with index 3 (red arch block, right bottom)
Step3: Move block with index 4 (yellow rectangular block, leftmost)
Step4: Move block with index 7 (yellow rectangular block, middle)
Step5: Move block with index 5 (yellow rectangular block, rightmost)
Step6: Move block with index 2 (red arch block, top middle)
Step7: Move block with index 11 (red rectangular block, top)
Step8: Move block with index 12 (orange triangular roof piece)
}

The structure is built from bottom to top, ensuring stability. The yellow rectangular blocks form a platform on top of the red arches, supporting the upper red arch and the final roof piece.
